name: Randomizator (itch)
description:
Location - the scientific base on the territory of which the experiments were conducted on the movement of matter in space and time. The results were remarkable,
but suddenly the situation changed. Almost all scientists
have been locked in a room in the base. It turned out a powerful artificial intelligence, which was involved in this project, out of control. Artificial Intelligence is control of the entire scientific base. You play as a scientist who was able to avoid isolation.    This scientist got to sample an experimental suit that has the ability to generate portals. With features suit that suit scientist his decided to stop the artificial intelligence.
